background_description: The background consists of dark, deep open water, appearing almost black, with faint specks of particulate matter visible. There are no prominent structures like coral, rocks, or sand.
explanation: The image clearly shows a Pufferfish with a bright yellow head and greenish-grey body, featuring a distinctive white mouth. Its colors and form stand out strongly against the dark, featureless background, indicating no attempt at camouflage.
